text: Gaspard-Gustave de Coriolis was a French mathematician, mechanical engineer and scientist. He is best known for his work on the supplementary forces that are detected in a rotating frame of reference, leading to the Coriolis effect. Category:French mathematicians Category:Scientists from Paris Category:French mechanical engineers Category:1792 births Category:1843 deaths
title: Gaspard-Gustave de Coriolis
